comment.body:
9
@Jayofthezero: not really if you had a back door like the NSA wanted to do for all of the computers in the US but the various civil rights groups fought them and won about 30 years ago. Now they just get intel from microsoft through their backdoors because as it was mentioned microsoft is a private company with billions of dollars that tricks people into volunteering there information in their terms of service.
@Hydragene: this is why anonymity is important.

We will be the leaders in the future. They will do like the USA has done to me and many others. They make us out to be criminals, but some of us (like me) are smart enough to keep the people from being fooled. Now they have an entire country of citizens who love me and hate them. So. Yeah. Lol :)

The masses do not adopt; you must become their trusty servant leader. You help them and they protect you because they know you are the good not the evil like the government.

Just dont let it get like China. This is what we are fighting to protect here right now. If we lose, then I die.
